TopicTitle: How to rescale scenery objects(if possible)?

Articles.Content: This may become useful in one of my future projects if it is actually possible, so it may be a good idea to ask now. Is there any way to move/rescale objects like VAB, monoliths, arches around by editing game files or using some tools? Precisely I'd like to make the cave(you know which one) a lot larger. How could that be achieved? They aren't terrain, in most cases, if I remember correctly, so maybe they are "configurable" to some extent?

No sorry I dont think so. Only the slider in optons that controls the count. Someone else might know something I don't though. For instance I learned last night that you can increase draw distance with the Lazor system mod. Pretty cool..
Scenery objects melt my PC not that i know of you can not rescale them
